channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3rd time reporting this!!!!!, 11th February
item.description:
See ref 8113611 and 8375578. There has been no information sent to us with regards to this and it has not been resolved however it has been closed. In very heavy rainfall the driveway will flood and flood in to the house and the next door neighbours property unless the sandbags are out. This has happened a few times in the last few years but luckily we were able to stop it. Please can this be addressed asap. At least try to actually contact me rather than continuing to close the tickets without explaining what is happening.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnmeadow Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Road is in an appalling state and is now difficult to drive on. Has been repaired recently but to a very poor standard, you may as well not have bothered., 11th February
item.description:
There are numerous potholes and if walking up the road especially at night it is now dangerous. Driving is difficult and now damaging vehicles suspension. This road desperately needs properly resurfacing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This drain is completely blocked and a lot of water cascades down this road from the flooded field, 11th February
item.description:
The drain outside Beverston is completely blocked

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large sheet of chipboard and some other stuff behind it dumped just outside my house, 11th February
item.description:
I have reported this in December and it is still there 6 weeks later, it is getting soggy now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disabled parking bays unmarked since work on surface, 11th February
item.description:
Parking area opposite the steps on The Terrace, Winchcombe. first two parking bays on the left, facing car park with wall behind you. These two Blue Badge bays have been poorly marked for a long time and now have no marking, with the result that they are used by all. This year I observed cones put out for work on 16th January and today 11.Feb the work is still to be done. During Nov/Dec last year the area was coned off, but no work was undertaken. These bays and those outside Morrisons are the only ones on level ground into the town
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Terrace, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Permnanent lights with different priorities to longstanding temp ones, 11th February
item.description:
These permanent lights have recently been switched on. However they are two-way whereas the longstanding temp ones (over 1 year in situ) were three-way. There is nothing to indicate this change in priorities making this very dangerous. Near miss witnessed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: The traffic light has been vandalised

item.title: Further update on 22097528, 11th February
item.description:
The water continues to pour down the junction of Bentham Lane and Dog Lane and has now created a sizeable pot hole in the entrance to Dog Lane. At one point there was a traffic cone to warn drivers of the issue but this has been removed.Meanwhile the pot hole is increasing in size and depth on a daily basis causing a real hazard to drivers who are unaware of just how deep this is as itâ€™s full of water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dog Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
